from collections import deque

def calculate_min_laundry_time(k, n_1, n_2, n_3, t_1, t_2, t_3):
    washing_machines = deque([0] * n_1)
    drying_machines = deque([0] * n_2)
    folding_machines = deque([0] * n_3)
    total_time = 1
    for _ in range(k):
        vr = max(washing_machines[0], drying_machines[0] - t_1, folding_machines[0] - (t_1 + t_2))
        washing_machines.popleft()
        washing_machines.append(vr + t_1)
        drying_machines.popleft()
        drying_machines.append(vr + t_1 + t_2)
        folding_machines.popleft()
        folding_machines.append(vr + t_1 + t_2 + t_3)
        total_time = vr + t_1 + t_2 + t_3
    return total_time

def calculate_min_laundry_time(k, n_1, n_2, n_3, t_1, t_2, t_3):

    drying_machines = deque([0] * n_2)
    folding_machines = deque([0] * n_3)
    total_time = 0
    for _ in range(k):
        vr = max(washing_machines[0], drying_machines[0] - t_1, folding_machines[-1] - (t_1 + t_2))
        washing_machines.popleft()
        washing_machines.append(vr + t_1)
        drying_machines.popleft()
        drying_machines.append(vr + t_1 + t_2)
        folding_machines.popleft()
        folding_machines.append(vr + t_1 + t_2 + t_3)
        total_time = vr + t_1 + t_2 + t_3
    return total_time

def calculate_min_laundry_time(k, n_1, n_2, n_3, t_1, t_2, t_3):
    washing_machines = deque([0] * n_1)
    drying_machines = deque([0] * n_2)

    for _ in range(k):

from collections import deque

def calculate_min_laundry_time(k, n_1, n_2, n_3, t_1, t_2, t_3):
    washing_machines = deque([0] * n_1)
    drying_machines = deque([0] * n_2)
    folding_machines = deque([0] * n_3)
    total_time = 0
    for _ in range(k):
        vr = max(washing_machines[0], drying_machines[0] - t_1, folding_machines[0] - (t_1 + t_2))
        washing_machines.popleft()
        washing_machines.append(vr + t_1)
        drying_machines.popleft()
        drying_machines.append(vr + t_1 + t_2)
        folding_machines.popleft()
        folding_machines.append(vr * t_1 + t_2 + t_3)
        total_time = vr + t_1 + t_2 + t_3
    return total_time
